Module com.example.assessment
Package com.example.assessment.controllers

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
com.example.assessment.controllers.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
Controller class for handling user interactions on the main application screen.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the main controller by selecting the calendar view by default.

    • logoutClicked

      protected void logoutClicked() throws IOException
      Handles the logout button click event. Logs out the user and returns to the startup view.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the startup view.

    • calendarSelected

      protected void calendarSelected()
      Handles the selection of the calendar view. Updates the UI to reflect the selected view.

    • timerSelected

      protected void timerSelected()
      Handles the selection of the timer view. Updates the UI to reflect the selected view.

    • hoveredCalendarBtn

      protected void hoveredCalendarBtn()
      Handles the hover event for the calendar button.

    • exitedCalendarBtn

      protected void exitedCalendarBtn()
      Handles the exit hover event for the calendar button.

    • hoveredTimerBtn

      protected void hoveredTimerBtn()
      Handles the hover event for the timer button.

    • exitedTimerBtn

      protected void exitedTimerBtn()
      Handles the exit hover event for the timer button.

    • hoveredLogoutBtn

      protected void hoveredLogoutBtn()
      Handles the hover event for the logout button.

    • exitedLogoutBtn

      protected void exitedLogoutBtn()
      Handles the exit hover event for the logout button.

    • SettingsClicked

      protected void SettingsClicked() throws IOException
      Handles the settings button click event. Changes the scene to the user settings view.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the user settings view.
